channel.title: Setting up a Web Client?
channel.description:
I wanna know how to set up a webclient cause even when i do release the client so people can play on my server, i am gonna edit the client so people will have to download the update :(
So i need to make a webclient so people just go to the website and play :/
So can anyone give me a link to a tutorial or just quick tell me how to do it?
Thank you! :D
(i do own a domain for the client to be on and i do have my own client, and i'm running 317 i think)

item.title: Setting up a Web Client?
item.dc:creator: @bobsisland bobsisland
item.description:
@bobsisland wrote:

Ok i’m gonna try it out!

1 sec i was afraid it was one of those hate posts like “Just forget it, it’s alot of work” or something

Thanks :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 15, 2009, 12:59:30 pm[/size][hr]So i made an account on the forum and as i wrote there:

On my website in the beggining, it’s just a grey box, then it turns white and that’s it. Nothing more happends. Why?

Read full topic
